attributes.action: Allow only a set maximum of standing passengers on a train
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To make it illegal to have more than a set maximum number of people standing on a train at any one time, sometimes more people are standing than there are sat down. There is a maximum number of standing people allowed on buses the same should apply to trains.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
